name: Pico's School DX
summary:
It's time to relive the past in this special 14th anniversary edition of Pico's School! Complety remade from the ground up with new graphics, new music but the same good ol' gameplay!

A group of Goth kids are turning a normal school day into a massacre. Save the day and free the school once again!
info:
• 平台: Web
  • 游戏类型: Adventure - Point 'n Click
  • 游戏引擎: Flash
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013年4月27日
  • 售价: Free

  • 开发: Kenney Vleugels (Kenney)
  • 音乐: Zach Striefel (ZStriefel)
  • 原作: Tom Fulp (TomFulp)
